句.definition: sentence; clause; phrase; classifier for phrases or lines of verse

句容市.definition: Jurong, county-level city in Zhenjiang 鎮江市|镇江市[Zhen4jiang1 Shi4], Jiangsu

句數.definition: number of sentences; number of lines (in verse etc)

句群.definition: discourse; group of sentences with clear meaning; narrative

句讀.definition: pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used); punctuation; periods and commas; sentences and phrases

句逗.definition: punctuation of a sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used); period 句號|句号 and comma 逗號|逗号; sentences and phrases

句驪河.definition: pre-Han name of Liao River 遼河|辽河[Liao2 He2]
